page.title: 05Farms on the Threave Estate
page.content: On each of the farms below, a lot of improvements have been carried out. The chief of these was a new water supply. Nowadays KELTON LODGE is occupied by Mr and Mrs Ramsey; a new farmhouse and cottage have been built. KELTON MAINS is occupied by Mr and Mrs Edgar; a new cottage and cattle court have been built. KELTON HILL has also had a new cattle court and farmhouse built. This farm is occupied by Mr and Mrs Smith. Hightae is occupied by Mr and Mrs White. Hightae is a large farm and more improvements have been carried out including a new cattle court. This farm looks very impressive.
